value.original: When the clean up process is executed, records older than this number of days will be removed. If this value is 0, all records will be removed.

row.value: When the clean up process is executed, records older than this number of days will be removed. If this value is 0, all records will be removed.

value.original: Truncates all the data in the table

row.value: Truncates all the data in the table

value.original:
Truncate all data in the table (technically truncate table DB statement). When flagged, all data in the table will be completely removed not being possible to define any other restriction.
It is only possible to truncate a table in case there is no any other table in the system having a foreign key pointing to this one.
Truncating a table results performs better in terms of time/resources consumption.

row.value:
Truncate all data in the table (technically truncate table DB statement). When flagged, all data in the table will be completely removed not being possible to define any other restriction.
It is only possible to truncate a table in case there is no any other table in the system having a foreign key pointing to this one.
Truncating a table results performs better in terms of time/resources consumption.
